name: Drawkit 3D Builder
description:
Build beautiful design with DrawKit 3D builder you can easily mix and match 3D illustrations and icons and drop them into your Figma file.


  • 6 Categories: Social Media, Cryptocurrency, Sparks, Primitive shapes, UI elements, Icons and more coming
  • Total 400+ images on the library
  • Each pack comes with color variations 
  • Free to use 


We will be updating and adding more plug-ins going forward so be sure to follow us in Figma and subscribe to our newsletter so you donâ€™t miss them. 


Love what we do? Give us a like and share this plug-in to your social media to support us!


PS: Psst! If you like our 3D Builder, check out Designstripe where you can build, edit and customize thousands of illustrations easily on our awesome web-app (They have free versions to try too!)
